entry.title: Welcome

html.p: Collect, test, and experiment with interface pattern pairings of CSS & HTML. Pears is an open source WordPress theme, enabling people like you to get your own pattern library up and running quickly. It has been ported to Symphony as an ensemble that you can easily install. It has also been created as plain old HTML. To easily update your site, use an XSLT processor as a static site generator. Simply run the build script inside the workspace directory to process the HTML files.

ol.li: No further installation necessary on Mac and Linux.
